text: Christian Bourquin (; 7 October 1954 - 26 August 2014) Sophie Babey, « Christian Bourquin est décédé », L'Indépendant, 26 August 2014 was a French politician. He was a member of the Socialist Party. He has been the president of the Regional Council of Languedoc-Roussillon from 2010 until his death in 2014. He served as Mayor of Millas from 1995 through 2001. He was born at Saint-Féliu-d'Amont, Pyrenees-Orientales. Bourquin died in Montpellier, Hérault, France, aged 59. ==References== ==Other websites== * Christian Bourquin official blog Category:1954 births Category:2014 deaths Category:French mayors Category:Socialist Party (France) politicians Category:People from Pyrénées-Orientales Category:Politicians from Occitanie
title: Christian Bourquin
